articles.title: Squid sighting: Scientists share first-ever footage of ‘freaky’ Ram’s Horn squid - Daily Express
articles.description: SQUID scientists have finally spotted one of the seas' most elusive cephalopods - the legendary Ram's Horn squid (Spirula spirula).

articles.author: RT
articles.title: Researchers confirm existence of 5-million-year-old HONEY BADGER relative that terrorized bigger predators on African plains - RT
articles.description: In new research, paleontologists working along the west coast of South Africa have confirmed the existence of an ancient relative of the modern honey badger that once terrorized the African savannah.
articles.content: The existence of a honey-badger-like animal had been hinted at by previous fossil finds, but has now been confirmed by Alberto Valenciano Vaquero and Romala Govender, who were conducting research for… [+1900 chars]

articles.author: Sean Martin
articles.title: Centaur discovered lurking deep in the solar system - Daily Express
articles.description: SCIENTISTS have discovered a new active centaur in the solar system which could unravel the history of our solar system.

articles.title: Michigan meteorite contains 'pristine' extraterrestrial organic compounds - Engadget
articles.description: A meteorite that lit up the night sky in Michigan in 2018 contains ‘pristine’ organic compounds that offer clues to how life formed on Earth, according to researchers.
articles.content: “This meteorite is special because it fell onto a frozen lake and was recovered quickly. It was very pristine. We could see the minerals weren't much altered and later found that it contained a rich … [+1183 chars]

articles.title: Drones Are Being Sent Straight Into Volcanoes, For Life-Saving Science - ScienceAlert
articles.description: With an estimated 300 active volcanoes on Earth, the challenge is how to monitor them all to send out early warnings before they erupt. Measuring volcanic gas emissions is also no easy task.
